ygData.subject: FW: EQVault... Bards Need your help
ygData.msgSnippet: Just a reference as to were the EQVault message came from ... From: Aurum - Christopher Wyatt [mailto:aurum@vaultnetwork.com] Sent: Wednesday, February 02,
ygData.messageBody:
Just a reference as to were the EQVault message came from

-----Original Message-----
From: Aurum - Christopher Wyatt [mailto:aurum@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 02, 2000 8:57 AM
To: firehawk
Subject: Re: EQVault... Bards Need your help


Check EQV. Hopefully that'll will refresh Verant's memory, and get
it speeded up. If it isn't up soon, I'll contact Geoffrey myself.

Hope it helps,
Aurum


----- Original Message -----
From: firehawk <firehawk@...>
To: <aurum@...>
Sent: Tuesday, February 01, 2000 11:34 PM
Subject: EQVault... Bards Need your help


> As you may have noticed Aurum in all the updates there have been almost no
> fixes or bonuses to bards. Of all classes bards do the least damage, are
> the only ones with missing spells (one per level 3 missing) have
completely
> useless song (mana drain song against creatures with unlimited mana and
> doesn't work in PVP) etc.
>
> Bards were promised a "Archmage answers" section dedicated to them 3
almost
> 4 weeks ago and still have not seen it. Please Aurum, please let people
> know there is another group of people who have tried very hard to be
silent
> and not cause trouble that a being ignored and treated like third class
> citizens. Look for yourself of all the responces given to the other
> classes.. by Verant and the total of 5 I can ever recall to the bard.
>
> Thanks for your time.
>
> Adon Draigcanwyr Bard
>
>
